SELECT BNO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENTS, HITS, TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') REGDATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, BNO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENTS, HITS, REGDATE FROM (SELECT BNO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENTS, HITS, REGDATE FROM OFFICE_BOARD
WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE WRITER LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endNum})
WHERE RN >=#{startNum}

SELECT COUNT(BNO) FROM OFFICE_BOARD
WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE WRITER LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
